title: Can't Login!
body:
It just says "Authenticating..." for about a minute, sometimes up to 10 minutes. Double-checked Username and Password are good. The following error I get is weird. This all started after a game I was in ended and it forced me to EXIT League Client.
I can post a screen shot if you want me to.  {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Living in Houston and same deal
ISP is Comcast {{summoner:3}}
Oh okay, so I'm not the only one. Wonder what happened. Guess someone tripped over the cord at RIOT haha.

> [{quoted}](name=Spartacusx,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yjQ7vgte,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-10-24T07:09:58.827+0000)
>
> Oh okay, so I'm not the only one. Wonder what happened. Guess someone tripped over the cord at RIOT haha.

whats weird is some of my other friends are on just fine and nothings wrong. but another friend this happened to..
Same here, my group is waiting for me to be able to log back in now... I'm in the South East US Region if that matters. Comcast.

> [{quoted}](name=Spartacusx,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yjQ7vgte,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-24T07:13:58.912+0000)
>
> Same here, my group is waiting for me to be able to log back in now... I'm in the South East US Region if that matters. Comcast.

im east coast, va, comcast. hmmmm

Were you able to get logged in successfully yet? There might be something blocking your network's route to our servers like a firewall possibly, so try turning those off really quickly to see if that helps. If not, go ahead and update your Port Forwarding and DNS settings. If you're not sure how, check out those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
Okay, finally got in. It took a while, but I'm in now. Thanks.
Could someone explain how you got yours to work i still cant log in been trying all day. :(
same here, dc'd in middle of the game and would never reconnect and was stuck on authenticating when i tried to re log, US East on Comcast

Fix Pls, disconnected in the middle of the game.

Edit*-Okay, it is working again
It says afterwards: An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists, contact support at support.riotgames.com
